rationale: No intensifier or comparative directly modifies a risk-adjective.
The segment uses neutral language describing findings/observations ('became ill', 'is not well adapted', 'seems to be what's happening').
The segment reports on study findings and real-world observation.
The segment does not contain a loaded rhetorical question.
The segment reports a finding and observation without explicit calming language.
'Only one of those three animals' uses a minimiser with an explicit scale contrast.
